item.title: onTouchEvent method in the ItemizedOverlay class.
item.description:
From hardikte...@gmail.com on February 18, 2014 15:27:59
Hi,
I am using mapsforge library. I want to implement feature to move Overlay with finger. To implement this feature it is required to have { public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event, MapView mapView)} method in the ItemizedOverlay class. But I am not able to get this method when overriding in Eclipse.
Has anybody faced this problem? ...please help me
I tried another approach, I downloaded the source code using git bash. But surprisingly I could not find ItemizedOverlay class. Is this source not updated in downloads section?
Thanks in advance.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=486

item.contents:
From hardikte...@gmail.com on February 19, 2014 03:24:32
Thanks for the prompt reply. Can you please provide java source code for mapsforge-map-0.3.0-jar-with-dependencies.jar ?

From LudwigBr...@gmail.com on May 25, 2014 21:27:13
There is support for the required method in 0.4.x. 0.3 is not supported anymore, so I am closing this issue.
